import React,{useState}from"react";import{auth,firestore}from"../firebase/firebaseConfig";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{signInWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import{doc,getDoc}from"firebase/firestore";import bgImage from'../images/background.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const userCredential=await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);const user=userCredential.user;const userDocRef=doc(firestore,"users",user.uid);const userDoc=await getDoc(userDocRef);if(userDoc.exists()){const userData=userDoc.data();if(userData.role==='admin'){navigate('/admin');}else if(userData.role==='customer'){navigate('/customerprofile');}else if(userData.role==='cook'){navigate('/cookprofile');}else{alert('Role not assigned!');}}else{alert('User data not found');}}catch(error){console.error('Login failed:',error.message);alert("Login failed.
